phrs.translation: 战斗性, 斗争性, 战斗精神, 交战状态

sentences.sentence: The new-found strength of local militancy appals many observers.
sentences.translation: 新发现的地方军事行动战斗力让很多观察员厌恶。

sentences.sentence: He said there is no single solution to the issue of militancy.
sentences.translation: 内格罗蓬特说，要解决激进主义的问题没有单一的解决方案。

sentences.sentence: But it is much less than the eradication of anti-India militancy that India demands.
sentences.translation: 但是相比印度铲除反印武装的要求而言，这还差得太远。
